column4: Question: can anyone help me set up a vnc server properly? I can connect to it over the lan, but when i try and forward port 22 (as internal and external in my router) and see whats running on what ports i cant see them :(

Question: can anyone help me set up a ssh server properly? I can connect to it over the lan, but when i try and forward port 22 (as internal and external in my router) and see whats running on what ports i cant see them :(
